TopicTitle: Hi! A few of my thoughts

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I am new to the forum but I have been playing KSP for a few months. It is truly an inspiring game.

Two things that I really miss though:

* Feature: Have enough information to achieve orbit, rendezvous and dock completely from IVA. I currently use mechjeb info panels for that.

* Bug fix: (yes, it is a bug) where SOI crossing during time warp messes up the calculations. I know that people use the Alarm mod as a WA but it would be nice if this was fixed in the game.

Hope to see these improvements. Keep up the good work!
